title: L.A. Noire: The Complete Edition – v1.3.2617 + All DLCs
body:
L.A. Noire: The Complete Edition – v1.3.2617 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Adventure, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Team Bondi / Rockstar Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 12.9 GB
Repack Size: 11 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: FileCorn (Uploaded by Sabco, compatible with MultiUpload mirrors) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on L.A.Noire.Complete.Edition.MULTi6-PROPHET ISO release: ppt-lanm.iso (13,894,539,264 bytes)
  • CrackFix, based on in CODEX Steam Emu applied (courtesy of DZ87), fixing the non-working PROPHET release
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 12.9 to 11 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~45 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 14 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
  • Run the game ONLY via desktop icon, created by the installer – that way you can change game options and language. Running the launcher itself may lead to game auto-update and the crack won’t work

Game Description

Using groundbreaking new animation technology, MotionScan, that captures every nuance of an actor’s facial performance in astonishing detail, L.A. Noire is a violent crime thriller that blends breathtaking action with true detective work to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience. Search for clues, chase down suspects and interrogate witnesses as you struggle to find the truth in a city where everyone has something to hide.

Amid the post-war boom of Hollywood’s Golden Age, Cole Phelps is an LAPD detective thrown headfirst into a city drowning in its own success. Corruption is rampant, the drug trade is exploding, and murder rates are at an all-time high. In his fight to climb the ranks and do what’s right, Phelps must unravel the truth behind a string of arson attacks, racketeering conspiracies and brutal murders, battling the L.A. underworld and even members of his own department to uncover a secret that could shake the city to its rotten core.

L.A. Noire is the first videogame to be honored as an Official Selection by the Tribeca Film Festival.

Included DLCs

  • The Broderick Detective Suit
  • The Sharpshooter Detective Suit
  • The Badge Pursuit Challenge & Button Man Suit
  • “The Naked City” Vice Case
  • “A Slip Of The Tongue” Traffic Case
  • “Nicholson Electroplating” Arson Case
  • “Reefer Madness” Vice Case
  • “The Consul’s Car” Traffic Case

What’s new compared to an old repack?

  • Smaller size (-200 MB)
  • Much faster installation
  • Less space required for installation (just the game size)
  • Almost non-existant HDD load during installation
  • No need for Rockstar Games Social Club to be installed
  • Proper language and game options changing via game launcher

Backwards compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous repack of this game.
